preferences.name: Error Handling
preferences.description: Use Result types instead of exceptions. Never throw from business logic.
evaluationCriteria: Returns Result<T, Error> instead of throwing
Error types are specific and documented

preferences.name: Immutability
preferences.description: Prefer immutable data. Use readonly, const, and avoid mutations.
evaluationCriteria: All properties marked readonly where possible
Arrays created with spread, not push

preferences.name: Documentation
preferences.description: Every public function has JSDoc with @param and @returns.
